item.title: h4cked
item.description: h4cked h4cked is an easy difficulty room on TryHackMe. Below are the steps I followed to answer the questions for this box. Hints Task 1 Hints Have you reviewed the packet capture to see what's going on? Look for some commonly used services to find which one is being brute forced by the attacker. Reviewing TCP streams will provide great insight into answering most of these questions.
